description: ff. 429. 287 x 193; 231 x 124 mm. 33 lin. Rabīʼ I, 1012. Continuation (takmilah) of Ibn al-Humāmʼs commentary: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 467 (commentary 9); S I, 645 (10). Incip.: ... کتاب الوکالة . لما فرغ من بىان احکام الشهادات بانواعها
author: Qāḍīʹzādah, Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd, d. 1580 or 81.
title: Natāʼij al-afkār fī kashf al-rumūz wa-al-asrār.
creator: Qāḍīʹzādah, Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd, d. 1580 or 81.
subject: Marghīnānī, ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr, -1196 or 1197—Hidāyah
